description:
Shima Tamahiko is a self-proclaimed pessimist who hates the world, and with good reason—he’s been exiled to the countryside by his wealthy family because of his disability. But his lonely life is turned upside down by the arrival of Tachibana Yuzuki, his arranged bride. Her cheerfulness slowly heals Shima’s heart in this slice of life romance set during the Taisho era.

(Source: Funimation)
synonyms: เรื่องเล่าของสาวน้อยยุคไทโช

tags.name: Disability
tags.description: A work that features one or more characters with a physical, mental, cognitive, or developmental condition that impairs, interferes with, or limits the person's ability to engage in certain tasks or actions.

tags.name: Rehabilitation
tags.description: Prominently features the recovery of a character who became incapable of social life or work.

tags.name: Historical
tags.description: Partly or completely set during a real period of world history.

tags.name: Heterosexual
tags.description: Prominently features a romance between a man and a woman, not inherently sexual.

tags.name: Marriage
tags.description: Centers around marriage between two or more characters.

tags.name: Coming of Age
tags.description: Centers around a character's transition from childhood to adulthood.

tags.name: Male Protagonist
tags.description: Main character is male.

tags.name: Primarily Teen Cast
tags.description: Main cast is mostly composed of teen characters.

tags.name: Rural
tags.description: Partly or completely set in the countryside.

tags.name: Cohabitation
tags.description: Features two or more people who live in the same household and develop a romantic or sexual relationship.

tags.name: Family Life
tags.description: Centers around the activities of a family unit.

tags.name: Tragedy
tags.description: Centers around tragic events and unhappy endings.

tags.name: Arranged Marriage
tags.description: Features two characters made to marry each other, usually by their family.

tags.name: Fairy Tale
tags.description: This work tells a fairy tale, centers around fairy tales, or is based on a classic fairy tale.

tags.name: Shounen
tags.description: Target demographic is teenage and young adult males.

tags.name: Hikikomori
tags.description: Prominently features a character who withdraws from social life, often seeking extreme isolation.

tags.name: Tsundere
tags.description: Prominently features a character who acts cold and hostile in order to mask warmer emotions.

tags.name: Iyashikei
tags.description: Primary aim is to heal the audience through serene depictions of characters' daily lives.

tags.name: Achronological Order
tags.description: Chapters or episodes do not occur in chronological order.

tags.name: Bullying
tags.description: Prominently features the use of force for intimidation, often in a school setting.

tags.name: Twins
tags.description: Prominently features two or more siblings that were born at one birth.

node.description:
[Website](https://www.garnidelia.com) | [YouTube](https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCAYfguaShVaNDU561_jJoOQ) | [Twitter](https://twitter.com/garnidelia)

__Members:__ female vocalist [MARiA](https://anilist.co/staff/102307/Mai-Mizuhashi) (Mai Mizuhashi), composer [toku](https://anilist.co/staff/160034/Yoshinori-Abe) (Abe Yoshinori)

The duo first collaborated on the song "Color," which was used as the opening theme to the 2010 anime _Freezing_. The name of their unit came from the French phrase "Le Palais Garnier de Maria" (Maria's Opera), and the asteroid Cordelia, which was discovered in 1978, the year of Toku's birth.

In 2014, they made their debut under major record label Defstar Records with the single "ambiguous," which was released on March 5, 2014. Its title track was used as the second opening theme to the 2013 anime _Kill la Kill_.

**Height:** 172 cm

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/tokishunichi) | [Official Website](http://tokishunichi.com/) | [Agency Profile](http://www.withline.jp/talent/?id=shunichi_toki)

**Non-Anime Roles**
• Rui Kamishiro (Project Sekai: Colorful Stage! feat. Hatsune Miku)
• Freminet (Genshin Impact)
• X (Reverse: 1999)

[Twitter](https://twitter.com/MARiA_GRND) | [Instagram](https://www.instagram.com/MARiA_GRND/) | [Blog (JP)](https://ameblo.jp/maria-grnd/) | [Biography (GARNiDELiA)](https://www.garnidelia.com/biography/)

__Introduction:__
Mai Mizuhashi, alternatively known by her stage name Maria (stylized as MARiA), is a Japanese vocalist, lyricist, composer, model and member of musical duo [GARNiDELiA](https://anilist.co/staff/120052/GARNiDELiA) alongside Toku ([Yoshinori Abe](https://anilist.co/staff/160034/Yoshinori-Abe)). She was formerly a member of the band Chix Chicks until their disbandment in July 27, 2010.
Yasushi Miwa is a advertising manager.
__Hirofumi Itou__ is a Japanese producer and advertising manager.

__[Website (pliom)](http://pliom.com/)__

__Toku__ (also known by his full name Yoshinori Abe) is a Japanese sound producer, arranger, composer and member of the pliom, and the duo [GARNiDELiA](https://anilist.co/staff/120052/GARNiDELiA). He is known for his sound producing work for artists such as [LiSA](https://anilist.co/staff/105561/LiSA), [Angela Aki](https://anilist.co/staff/101394/Angela-Aki) and [Antic Cafe](https://anilist.co/staff/100972/An-Cafe).

__[Website (pliom)](http://pliom.com/)__

__Toku__ (also known by his full name Yoshinori Abe) is a Japanese sound producer, arranger, composer and member of the pliom, and the duo [GARNiDELiA](https://anilist.co/staff/120052/GARNiDELiA). He is known for his sound producing work for artists such as [LiSA](https://anilist.co/staff/105561/LiSA), [Angela Aki](https://anilist.co/staff/101394/Angela-Aki) and [Antic Cafe](https://anilist.co/staff/100972/An-Cafe).
